bug.author: aadityasp1
bug.summary: Carla 0.9.9 crashes with Segmentation Fault error due to the new Opendrive tool.
bug.description: Hi, I'm trying out the Opendrive standalone tool on Carla 0.9.9. Compiled version. (using NVIDIA 1080Ti Gpu, Ubuntu 16.04) When I run ./CarlaUE4.sh, server opens up fine, but when I try to connect to it with config.py client under PythonAPI/Util with a the new - x abc.xodr. The server window crashes. With the following error. Disabling core dumps. Signal 11 caught. Malloc Size=65538 LargeMemoryPoolOffset=65554 CommonUnixCrashHandler: Signal=11 Malloc Size=65535 LargeMemoryPoolOffset=131119 Malloc Size=107920 LargeMemoryPoolOffset=239056 Engine crash handling finished; re-raising signal 11 for the default handler. Good bye. Segmentation fault (core dumped) What could be the reason for crash? I tried with ./CarlaUE4.sh - opengl and ./CarlaUE4.sh -opengl3 args also, but it still crashes.
